<font color=SteelBlue face="Helvetica"><h3>**Motivation:**</h3></font>

<p>According to our model, we defined some characteristics that people who committed suicide share. We do not have discrimination of any kind, including gender, age and etc. The risk factors mentioned in below questionnaire is just statistical results gained from our model. We used these risk factors generated by our model as well as some some proven risk factors in publications to conduct this selftest questionnaire. The motivation behind this selftest questionnaire is to encourage people to take selfcare and comfortably confront their potential mental illness. Everyone has a possible depression time during his or her life. Please actively reach our for help when you have a POSSIBILITY of SUICIDE! Now you can take the test below:</p>


**Note: Take the test for fun and your test result is not a certified prediction!**

<p>Have you ever suffered from any mental illness?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="ill" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="ill" value="0"> No<br>

<p>Have you ever thought about or attempted to kill yourself?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="self" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="self" value="0"> No<br>
  
<p>Are you a male(according to our results, male are 3 times more likely to commit suicide than female)?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="gender" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="gender" value="0"> No<br>
  
<p>Are you over 75(according to our results, people over 75 years old has the highest suicide ratio in all population)?</p>
  <input type="radio" name="age" value="1"> Yes<br>
  <input type="radio" name="age" value="0"> No<br>

  
<p>Other factors: Do you expect that you will fail to pass Data Science?</p>
